response.job_title: STEM Expert, IB Teacher, Chemical Engineer, CELTA Certified, Unity Developer
response.summary:
- Chemical Engineer, able to work with STEM subjects.
- IB teacher. 6 years experience in mathematics MYP and DP.
- Unity developer. Experience in digitizing education activities.
- CELTA certified for teaching English.
- Expertise in educational projects.
- Fluent English proficiency.
- Conversational Japanese.
- Conversational German.
response.skills: Teaching, Chemistry, Motivational Speaking, Physics, Mathematics, Languages, Logic, Love to Learn, Maintaining A Positive Attitude, Calm, Go-getter attitude, Docencia, Microsoft Office, Matemáticas, Química, Desarrollo de software, Tecnología educativa, International Baccalaureate, Ciencia, tecnología, ingeniería y matemáticas (CTIM), Inglés

profile_positions.description:
El Liceo V.A.L. se caracteriza por ser una institución educativa con un proyecto de inclusión inigualable en la ciudad de Bogotá, dando la oportunidad a los estudiantes de desarrollarse mediante el autoaprendizaje y la convivencia con todo tipo de personas con distintas necesidades educativas, esto es: estudiantes con capacidades excepcionales, estudiantes típicos o estudiantes con necesidades educativas especiales. 

Acompaño el desarrollo integral de los estudiantes, guiando su trabajo, su organización, su planeación y su formación. 

Tutor de matemáticas, física, química e inglés.
profile_positions.title: Docente

profile_positions.description:
Asesorías y acompañamiento de estudio en las áreas de matemáticas, física y química (tanto en español como en inglés).

Ayuda en preparación del examen SAT (Standard Aptitude Test).
profile_positions.title: Tutor

profile_positions.description:
Estudio de mercados en el área de comercio de productos químicos.

Asistencia al personal de ventas de Bayer Agency Business con información del mercado.

Actualización y creación de Fichas Técnicas, Hojas de Seguridad y Tarjetas de Emergencia de productos químicos.
profile_positions.title: Practicante

company.name: Sora Schools
company.description:
Sora is a live, virtual project-based high school designed to accelerate students towards their wildest dreams.

Our non-traditional curriculum is designed around your student's interest and learning style. We give students at Sora real agency and responsibility in their learning, which means they're much more engaged than in traditional programs. Students truly have a say in their education in terms of what they study, how they learn a subject, and in what format they can demonstrate their knowledge. We help students explore their interests and, once they've narrowed in on a field, help students accelerate towards their learning goals. 

Our educational philosophy on project-based learning and real-world application allows students to do more hands-on work and build a strong portfolio of experience for future job and college applications. We connect students to experienced industry mentors for them to learn from. For college-bound students, we prepare students for college applications and help them explore their next step after graduation. Ultimately, our mission is to prepare students for their future careers, not just how be a good test-taker.
